hints.content:
This number line shows $\tealD{7}$ jumps of $\goldE{6}$ units each.

![A number line labeled 0, 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42. Arrows labeled, plus 6, point right from each number to the next. A brace labeled, 7 equal jumps, spans all 7 arrows.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8425a87d2633dd1a87942515e4ddd62e95bfebf7)

It starts at $0$ and ends at $42$.

We can also reach $42$ using $\goldE{6}$ jumps of $\tealD{7}$ units each.

![A number line labeled 0, 7, 14, 21, 28, 35, 42. Arrows labeled, plus 7, point right from each number to the next. A brace labeled, 6 equal jumps, spans all 6 arrows.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3136e7cecaddaf0e7fd24bb4f9d79fe068364d90)

[[☃ explanation 1]]

These pictures could represent $7\times 6$:

![A number line labeled 0, 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8f91d90257d23a6c032123e3c9a05127d02cffcf)

![A number line labeled 0, 7, 14, 21, 28, 35, 42. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/453a76d8a30db8fe73f02a8909971b21678b740e)

question.content:
**Which $2$ number lines could we use to represent $7 \times 6$ ?**

[[☃ radio 1]]

choices.content: ![A number line labeled 0, 6, 12, 18, 24, 30, 36, 42. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/8f91d90257d23a6c032123e3c9a05127d02cffcf)
![A number line labeled 0, 7, 14, 21, 28, 35, 42. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/453a76d8a30db8fe73f02a8909971b21678b740e)
![A number line labeled 0, 7, 14, 21, 28. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/9c3606aaa93ec20a395a1cd01307935e4ac63c7b)
![A number line labeled 0, 6, 12, 18, 24, 30. Arrows point right from each number to the next.](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/3d1f97919369355bf71e79112b942a1c7b4d911b)
